ext_description.p: A Component_2d_embedded_location is a type of . The Component_2d_embedded_location places components in a substrate under the constraint that is is required to maintain contact with on both the top and bottom of the component.
ext_description.note: The referenced by the referenced by reference_joint should be a constituent of one of the surfaces referenced by precedent_surface or subsequent_surface.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the reference_terminal specifies the that joins the of the component being located to the or that implements the internal connection to the circuitry in the rest of the substrate.

the subsequent_surface specifies the that joins the of the component being located to the associated stratum surface. The in this role is identifying the stratum surface that is further away from the primary stratum in the substrate than is the embedded component itself.

the precedent_surface specifies the that joins the of the component being located to the associated stratum surface. The in this role is identifying the stratum surface that is closer to the primary stratum in the substrate than is the embedded component itself.
A Design_intent_modification_in_stratum_planar_position is the two dimensional position and orientation of a two dimensional model of a in the two dimensional model of the .
the feature_shape specifies a for the Design_intent_modification_planar_position. It is or a ,
the transformation specifies the for the Design_intent_modification_planar_position.
the design_shape specifies the for the Design_intent_modification_planar_position.
A Design_intent_modification_planar_shape is a type of . A Design_intent_modification_planar_shape is the representation of a by a .
the represented_design_intent_modification specifies the that is to be characterized by the Design_intent_modification_planar_shape.

A Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation is the representation of one or more as one of a , or a . A Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation is parametric data provided to support an algorithm that calculates explicit geometry. Since the geometry may be discontiguous (fill may included dashed lines), more than one may be referenced by Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation as the resulting product data of the algorithm execution. The geometric data resulting from execution of the algorithm shall be included in if it is not desired to exchange the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation. Exchanging or sharing both the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation and the that result from execution of the algorithm may be appropriate. Therefore an optional attribute that specifies the planar shapes that are derived from the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation is to be included in an exchange if both the planar shape and the styled area representation is included. The units used in the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation shall be those specified in the global geometric for the design as specified by . If the geometry is contiguous, there shall be only one referenced.
the shape_styled_area_representation specifies one of a , or a that represents the modification in the Design_intent.
the represented_design_intent_modification specifies the that is characterized by this Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation.

the derived_planar_shape specifies the for the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation. There may be more than one for the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation. A need not be provided for the Design_intent_modification_styled_area_representation.
